og.description:
Health savings accounts would do a far superior job of solving America's healthcare problems than Obamacare, says Dr. Ben Carson.
Health savings accounts can take care of 80 percent of doctor/patient encounters, Carson said on Fox News Channel's  On the Record with Greta...
